mmr, elo, lp gain, what ever u wanna call it

Looking at OP.GG it seems your MMR was at the level it is now both before the season started and throughout your placements. Because of the way the ranked system works you can actually have an MMR that is an entire division below your rank before being demoted, which it seems happened to you.
Can i ask what order you won/loss your games in?
This actually contributes a lot to your placements. A lot of people just disregard the game orders and just state the win loss ratio without contributing the actual order they were made.

Similar thing happened to me. Managed to pop into s5 at end of last season,  flirted with s4 in preseason. Now in b3 after placements.  

have come across a number of smurfs in the last few weeks - more than normal.  I guess folks are helping their mates with placements.
